This webpage provides information on the causes, symptoms, and treatment options for chest pain and dizziness occurring together. It lists various potential causes such as anxiety, high blood pressure, panic attacks, and heart-related issues. The article highlights when to seek emergency help and suggests lifestyle changes, medications, and medical interventions like pacemakers or valve surgery. It's important to pay attention to symptoms and seek medical help if the pain and dizziness persist for more than 15 minutes.
